author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

author: Howard Aiken
quote: Don’t worry about people stealing an idea. If it’s original, you will have to ram it down their throats.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

author: Frank Chimero
quote: To make pearls, you've got to eat dirt.

author: Buddha
quote: What we think, we become

author: Edith Wharton
quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.

author: Anonymous
quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.

author: Harvey Fierstein
quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted, in spite of your changing moods.

author: Cormac McCarthy
quote: You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from.

author: Mary Engelbreit
quote: Life's too mysterious to take too serious.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Albert Einstein
quote:
The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. 
The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has been before.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote:
You can't go around building a better world for people. Only people can build a better world for people. 
Otherwise it's just a cage.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote: There isn't a way things should be. There's just what happens, and what we do.

author: Rocky Balboa
quote: It's not about how hard you can hit; it's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.

author: African proverb
quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

author: T. Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: Anonymous
quote: Happiness is an inside job.

author: Anonymous
quote: There is no elevator to success — you have to take the stairs.

author: Jose Luis Borges
quote: Plant your garden and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then, when you know better, do better.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway.

author: Anonymous
quote: Do not set yourself on fire in order to keep others warm.

author: Anonymous
quote: It's supposed to be hard. If it were easy, everyone would do it.

author: Anonymous
quote: Ask yourself if what you're doing today will get you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.

author: Dita Von Teese
quote: You can be the ripest, juciest peach in the world and there's still going to be someone who hates peaches.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Conan O'Brian
quote: If you work really hard and are kind, amazing things will happen.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
